name: Little Medusa
detailed_description:
Become a polymorphed deity and take back Mount Olympus in this top-down puzzle game! The Titans have escaped their eternal prisons and transformed Artemiza, a young goddess, into a gorgon. Now she must petrify enemies, solve puzzles, and dodge traps in her battle to save the realms of the gods!

Features

  • Go full goron as a lovable protagonist brought to life with beautiful, and brand-new art that shines with charm!
  • Battle Royale with your friends as Little Medusa and the other Little Olympians in the all new multiplayer mode!
  • Customize your multiplayer battles with over 30 modifiers!
  • Petrify your way through 5 worlds of puzzles and danger!
  • Clash with centaurs, fallen heroes, and the Titans themselves!
  • Solve the puzzles fast enough and unlock a secret world, complete with a new ending to the story!
  • Carve a brand new myth with an exciting story inspired by Greek mythology!
  • For all the Greek gods and goddesses out there, we've added Olympian Mode, a hard as rock challenge with permadeath. You've got one chance to get beat each stage, defeat all the Titans, and Go Full Gorgon to unlock the final achievement!
